slogan2: To wo nsa gu ho, gye nkwa
heroSubtitle: Rebɔ mogya afɔfoɔ a wɔpɛ so ho ne ayaresabea ahorow wɔ Ghana nyinaa.
partnerHospitals: Ayaresabea a Yɛyɛ Adwuma Wɔ Ho
activeDonors: Afoforo a Wɔtɔ Mogya da Biara
everyDropCountsSubtitle: Bɛka Ghanani mpempem a wɔreboa nkurɔfoɔ. Wo mogya betumi agye nkwa.
newsletterSubtitle: Bɔ wo din na nya nkɔmɔ a ɛfa mogya mfaso ne mmerɛ ho.
faqQ1: Ɛyɛ den anaa ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ wobɛtɔ mogya?
faqA1: Aane. Wɔde needle a yɛde mpɛn baako na yɛde yɛ adwuma. Nti ɛnni ho ɔhaw.
faqQ2: Bere bɛn na metumi atɔ mogya bio?
faqA2: Mogya foforɔ betumi atɔ mogya da biara nnawɔtwe 8 mu. Platelet/plasma no ho nsɛm yɛ soronko.
faqQ3: Sɛ metɔ mogya a, mɛyɛ mmerɛ anaa?
faqA3: Pii no, wɔn ho yɛ. Wo nipadua bɛsan ama nsuo no mu nkɔ so wɔ nna baako mu.
faqQ4: Metumi atɔ mogya sɛ mewɔ tattoo?
faqA4: Sɛ wɔyɛɛ tattoo no wɔ bea a wɔde abɔdin na wɔde hyehyɛɛ ho a, wubetumi atɔ mogya mfeɛ abiɛsa akyi.
faqQ5: Mmogya no tɔ bere tenten sɛn?
faqA5: Mogya a wɔfa no yɛ dɔnhwere 8-10. Nanso adwuma no nyinaa fa dɔnhwere baako.
faqQ6: Sɛ metuu akwantuo nnansa yi a, ɛbɛka me ho?
faqA6: Sɛ wotu kɔɔ beae a wɔwɔ malaria anaa yareɛ foforɔ a, wɔbɛma wo so kakra.
faqQ7: Mepɛ sɛ mehu mogya bɔne ansa na matɔ?
faqA7: Dabi. Wɔbɛka w’abɔne ho akyire mogya no tɔ no akyi.
faqQ8: Sɛ mete aduro bi a, metumi atɔ mogya?
faqA8: Aduro biara nni ho asɛm. Fa aduro a wode refa no bɛma adwumayɛfoɔ no.
story1Title: Michael Tɔ Mogya a Ɛgye Nkwa
story1Text: Michael tɔɔ mogya ne bere a edi kan afe a atwa mu. Ne mogya boaa abofra bi wɔ ayaresabea.
story2Text: Eliana ho yɛ no fɛ kakra na ne maame se mogya no gyee ne nkwa.
story3Text: Car accident akyi, Dolly nyae mogya 4 unit. “Nnipa a mennim gyee me nkwa,” ɔkae.
partnerHospitalsSponsors: Ayaresabea ne Ahwɛfoɔ a Yɛyɛ Adwuma Wɔ Ho
healthRequirement: Woyareɛ a ɛyɛ den anaa haw a ɛyɛ den wɔ nna 14 a atwam no mu
intervalRequirement: Ɛnyɛ nnawɔtwe 8 na atwam ansa na woatɔ bio
hemoglobinRequirement: Wo mogya mu hemoglobin wɔ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ den mu
pregnancyRequirement: Woyɛ ɔyere a wonnya mma anaa wonwo mma da
appSubtitle: Bɔ ho din, nya akyinnye, na hwɛ nea woyɛ fi wo fon so.
createDonorProfile: Bɔ w’abɔdin a ɛfa mogya ho
urgentNeedDesc: Ayaresabea hia O- mogya ama adidi ntɛm
howDonationWorks: Sɛnea Mogya Tɔ Adwuma No Yɛ
registrationDesc: Hyɛ wo ho din na ka w’ahoɔden ho nsɛm
healthScreeningDesc: Dɔkita bɛhwɛ wo temp, mogya mu tumi, pulse, ne hemoglobin
bloodDonationDesc: Tɔ mogya no gye dɔnhwere 8-10. Wubɛtɔ pint baako.
restRefreshmentsDesc: Tɔ mogya akyi no, home na di biribi kakra mfeɛ 15 ansa na wokɔ
testimonialQuote1: Mewɔ anigye sɛ mogya a metɔɔ boaa nkurɔfoɔ. LifeLine yɛɛ adwuma no mmerɛ.
testimonialQuote2: Mobile van no baa yɛn suapɔn so. Ɛyɛ mmerɛ!
testimonialQuote3: Mepɛ LifeLine, na meka akyerɛ nnipa a wɔn ho yɛ den. Tɔ mogya, gye nkwa.
scheduleDonationParagraph: Yɛda wo ase sɛ wopɛ sɛ wogye nkwa. Mesrɛ, hyɛ form no ase na hyɛ bere.
bulletEat: Di aduan pa ɛfa dɔnhwere 2 ansa na wotɔ mogya
bulletDrink: Nom nsuo pii na gya nsa-ho-drop
bulletClothing: Fa atade a wɔnsa betumi asɔ fam
